QuestData.Title: The Battle For Crusaders' Pinnacle
QuestData.Description: <Highlord Fordring holds a banner of the Argent Crusade.>$B$BThis banner is like no other, $n. It carries with it a powerful blessing, able to sanctify large tracts of blighted land.$B$BYou must take it northwest, through the Breach, to an area the Scourge have mockingly named Crusaders' Pinnacle. Plant the banner atop the skulls of our fallen brethren at Crusaders' Pinnacle and defend it against attack. Once the land is sanctified, return to Father Gustav.$B$BGo now, $n. Hold no fear in your heart.
QuestData.LogDescription: Venture to Crusaders' Pinnacle and use the Blessed Banner of the Crusade atop the Pile of Crusader Skulls. Defend the banner against Scourge attack until the land atop the pinnacle is sanctified and then return to Father Gustav at the Valley of Echoes in Icecrown.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Father Gustav at the Valley of Echoes in Icecrown.
QuestData.RewardText: Blessed Light! We have taken the pinnacle! Finally, construction of Justice Keep can begin. Highlord Fordring and the knights are already en route to our new base. You must meet them there, $n!
